widget.name: enable
widget.label: Enable content filter
widget.caption: Enable the BluePex content filter
widget.description: Check this to enable the BluePex content filter. Note that you most likely also need to configure the content filter rules.

widget.name: enable_emergency
widget.label: Enable high disponibility
widget.caption: Enable the BluePex high disponibility
widget.description: Check this to enable the BluePex high disponibility. This options allow the BluePex WebFilter work in the emergency mode, this will allow the proxy keep working if the redirectors don't work..

widget.name: content_filter_processes
widget.label: Content filter number processes
widget.description: Enter with number process Content Filter.

widget.name: use_custom_urls
widget.label: Redirect to custom URL
widget.caption: Redirect to custom URL
widget.description: If you enable this, you will be allowed to specify the page that users will be redirected when their access is denied. Note that the URL you specify must be accessible by all users that are subject to filtering. You might want to add those URLs to the whitelist to ensure this is always the case.

widget.name: custom_content_url
widget.label: Custom URL
widget.description: Enter the URL that users will be redirected to when trying to access a blocked URL.
